description.p: A modern, simple to use, constantly evolving and hella fast MEDIA CUTTER + JOINER w/ frame-accurate SmartCut technology, chapter support, media stream selection for audio + subtitle channels and blackdetect video filter support to automatically detect scene changes or skip commercials in digital TV recordings.

ul.li: Lossless, super fast media cutting and joining (FFmpeg)
Timeline thumbnails for more accurate seeking
SmartCut frame-accurate cutting option (disabled by default)
Attractive, simple to use Qt5 based interface
Chapter support allowing scene chapter names to be included in final media metadata. NOTE: results will only work in media players that support chapters
Flatpak release includes latest stable versions of FFmpeg, libmpv, MediaInfo and PyQt5 running on the KDE runtime for a stable Qt5 experience

description.p: Maintenance release updating to latest 5.11 KDE runtime + updated dependencies + fix for hardware accelerated decoding on NVIDIA GPUs.

First official Flatpak release bundled with the very latest stable releases of FFmpeg, mpv, MediaInfo and supporting codecs. The latest version introduces chapter support, black detect filter processing for scene detection + commercial skipping. Produced media files are now passed through a finalizing process as a new last step to help ensure sane results. Plus hundreds of bug fixes, optimisations and improvements over previous incarnations.
